content: Nice to meet you, Avery. Why are you interested in a retail assistant position?
Retail assistant position because I'm really good at reading price tags
Great response, Avery. How about dealing with difficult customers? Can you handle tantrums better than a toddler's daycare?
I'm the oldest of four, so I have plenty of experience dealing with children and how to handle tantrums.
Oh, real-life training, fantastic! Can you multitask as well as a stressed out octopus?
